item.description:
The Meetup Organizers New Year's Eve Party

Hosted by Heather of Nerd Fun and the 128 Lunch Club, Greg of the Boston Walking and Leisure Cycling groups, and Biaggio, assistant organizer to the world.

Cost includes appetizers, dj, noisemakers, and a midnight champagne toast. Cash bar.

$25 payment due by December 15.

The party is being held at a bar near North Station which holds 90. We are trying to fill it with meeteup people so it can be a private party. Send me your email address and I will add it to the e-vite. From there you can buy your tickets from the bar online.
item.name: New Year's PARTY !!
